author: m.kalinin
content:
What does everybody think about forward compatibility of eth2 network stack? Do we need to support it or not? I've put my opinion and possible solution based on discovery v5 in this comment https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/1281#issuecomment-515030592? 

Would be great to know what other teams think about it. Maybe there are other approaches to updates in live p2p networks that I am not aware of.
